ing.item: Ziti Noodles or any other big noodles

directions.step: Mix hamburger and sausage together and make into balls and cook until done and brown. Mix in prego sauce. Cook noodles according to package. Layer noodles in bottom of casserole dish. Then spoon on sauce/meat mixture. Then a layer of cheese(s). Continue to layer items until dish is full or you use all the sauce and noodles. Bake in preheated oven at 325 degrees for 25-35 minutes until cheese is melted and golden. Posted to EAT-L Digest by "Winona Y. Wentworth" <wyw@ATOMIC.NET> on Sep 2, 1997
